quotes.author: Betsy DeVos
quotes.text: You can't say definitively today, that guns shouldn't be in schools? I would imagine that there is probably a gun in the schools to protect from potential grizzlies.

quotes.author: Betsy DeVos
quotes.text: I have decided, however, to stop taking offense at the suggestion that we are buying influence. Now I simply concede the point. They are right. We do expect some things in return.
